not-looking-at-shop: §cAucun shop trouvé. Tu dois en regarder un.
no-permission: §cTu n'as pas la permission de faire ça.
no-creative-break: &cYou cannot break other players shops in the creative mode, switch to survival mode or try to use supertool {0} instead.
no-double-chests: §cTu ne peux pas casser les shops des autres joueurs en mode créatif. Utilise le mode survie ou le super outil à la place. ({0})
player-bought-from-your-store-tax: §c{0} a acheté {1} {2} dans ton shop, et tu as payé {3} de taxes.
you-cant-afford-to-change-price: §cCela coûte {0} de changer le prix de ton shop.
shops-arent-locked: §cSouviens toi que les shops ne sont pas protégés contre le pillage! Tu dois les verrouiller ou protéger ta zone pour éviter le vol.
shop-stock-too-low: §cIl ne reste que {0} {1} dans ce shop.
negative-amount: §cTu ne peux pas échanger une quantité négative !
shop-out-of-stock: §5Ton Shop aux coordonnées {0}, {1}, {2}, est à court de {3}
shop-has-no-space: §cCe shop n'a de la place que pour {0} de plus {1}.
the-owner-cant-afford-to-buy-from-you: §cCela coûte {0} mais le propriétaire n'a que {1}
price-is-now: §aLe nouveau prix de ce shop est: §e{0}
shop-has-changed: §cLe shop que tu essayes d'utiliser à changé depuis que tu as cliqué dessus!
nearby-shop-this-way: §aLe shop est à {0} blocs de toi.
buying-more-than-selling: §cATTENTION: Tu est entrains d'acheter des objets plus cher que tu ne les vends.
owner-bypass-check: §eVérifications évitées, Echange réussi ! (Tu es propriétaire du shop)
reached-maximum-can-create: §cTu as déjà créé un nombre max de shop {0}/{1}!
no-enough-money-to-keep-shops: §cTu n'as plus d'argent pour garder tes shops.. Tous les hops sont supprimé.
break-shop-use-supertool: &eYou can break the shop by using the SuperTool.
failed-to-put-sign: &cNot enough space around the shop to place the information sign.
failed-to-paste: &cFailed upload data to Pastebin, Check the internet and try again. (See console for details)
warn-to-paste: &eCollecting data and upload to Pastebin, this may need a while. &c&lWarning&c, The data is keep public one week, it may leak your server configuration, make sure you only send it to your &ltrusted staff/developer.
price-too-high: &c The shop price too high! You can't create one that is priced higher than {0}.
you-cant-create-shop-in-there: §cVous n'avez pas la permission de créer un shop à cet emplacement!
unknown-player: &cTarget player doesn't exist, please check the username you typed.
shop-staff-cleared: &aSuccessfully removed all staff for your shop.
success-change-owner-to-server: &aSuccessfully set the shop owner to Server.
purchase-failed: &cPurchase failed: Internal Error, please contact the server administrator.
no-pending-action: &cYou do not have any pending action

menu.sell-tax-self: §aCe shop t'appartient donc tu ne payes pas de taxes.

how-many-buy: &aEntrez le nombre d'objet que vous souhaitez &bACHETER&a dans le tchat. Vous pouvez acheter jusqu'à &e{0}&a objets. Entrez &ball&a pour tout acheter.
how-many-sell: &aEntrez le nombre d'objet que vous souhaitez &dVENDRE&a dans le tchat. Vous possédez &e{0}&a objets. Entrer &ball&a pour tout vendre.
not-allowed-to-create: §cTu ne peux pas creer de shop ici.
blacklisted-item: §cCet objet est dans la liste noire. Tu ne peux pas le vendre.
how-much-to-trade-for: &aEnter in chat, how much you wish to trade &e{1}x {0}&a for.

command.wrong-args: &cParameters don't match, use /qs help to check help

description.amount: &eExecute for your actions with amount(For chat plugin issue)
description.supercreate: &eCreate a shop bypass all protection checks
description.title: §aAide QuickShop
description.price: §eChange le prix achat/vente d'un de tes shops
description.find: §eLocalise le shop d'un type spécifique le plus proche.
description.refill: §eAjoute un nombre donné d'objet à un shop
description.create: §eCréé un nouveau shop avec le coffre que vous regardez
description.size: &eChange per bulk amount of a shop
description.removeall: &eRemove ALL shops of a specified player

command.cleaning: §aNettoyage des shops avec un stock de 0 en cours...
command.now-debuging: &aSuccessfully switched to developer mode, Reloading QuickShop...
command.now-nolonger-debuging: &aSuccessfully switched to production mode, Reloading QuickShop...
command.invalid-bulk-amount: &cThe given value {0} larger than max stack size or lower than one
command.no-trade-item: &aPlease hold a trade item to change in main hand

controlpanel.mode-selling-hover: &eCliquez pour changer le mode du shop. (achat/vente)
controlpanel.mode-buying-hover: &eCliquez pour changer le mode du shop. (achat/vente)
controlpanel.stack-hover: &eCliquer pour changer le volume de vente.

updatenotify.remote-disable-warning: &cThis version of QuickShop is marked disabled by remote server, that mean this version may have serious problem, get details from our SpigotMC page: {0}. This warning will appear and spam your console until you use other not disabled version to replace this one, doesn't effect your server running.

shop-removed-cause-ongoing-fee: &cYou shop at {0} was removed cause you had no enough money to keep it!
no-permission-remove-shop: &cYou do not have permission to use that command. Try break the shop instead?
digits-reach-the-limit: &cYou have reach the limit of the digits after the dot in price.
not-managed-shop: You isn't the owner or moderator of the shop
shops-backingup: Backing up the shops from database...
saved-to-path: The backup file was saved to {0} .
backup-failed: Cannot backup the database, check the console for details.
translate-not-completed-yet-click: The translation of language {0} has completed {1}, Do you want help us to improve the translation? Click Here!
translate-not-completed-yet-url: The translation of language {0} has completed {1}, Do you want help us to improve the translation? Browse: {2}
3rd-plugin-build-check-failed: &c3rd party plugin &l{0}&r&c denied the permission checks, did you have permission setup in there?
trading-in-creative-mode-is-disabled: &cYou cannot trade with shop in the creative mode.
supertool-is-disabled: &cSupertool is disabled, cannot break any shop.
shop-now-freezed: &aYou are frozen the shop, and nobody can trade with this shop now!
shop-nolonger-freezed: &aYou are unfrozen the shop, it back to normal now!
shop-cannot-trade-when-freezing: &cYou cannot trade with this shop cause it under freezing.
denied-put-in-item: &cThis item cannot put in this shop!
how-many-buy-stack: &aEnter how many bulks you wish to &bBUY&a in chat. There have &e{0}&a items in each bulk and You can buy &e{1}&a bulks. Enter &ball&a to buy them all.
how-many-sell-stack: &aEnter how many bulks you wish to &dSELL&a in chat. There have &e{0}&a items in each bulk and You have &e{1}&a bulks available. Enter &ball&a to sell them all.
